item.title: Watch The Exclusive Trailer For New Thriller-Comedy Kidnapping Inc.
item.description: Exclusive: ScreenRant presents the trailer for Bruno Mourral's thriller-comedy, Kidnapping Inc., which stars Jasmuel Andri and Rolapthon Mercure.

item.title: Elizabeth Banks's 10 Best Movies And TV Shows
item.description: Elizabeth Banks has worked in some great movies and TV shows alongside her blossoming career as a director.

item.title: Terrifier 3 Streaming Release Date Revealed
item.description: The streaming release date for 2024's Terrifier 3 is revealed, and it will be followed by a making-of documentary about the Art the Clown slasher.
